sn41.1:1.1: Ekam samayam sambahula thera bhikkhu macchikasande viharanti ambatakavane.
sn41.1:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulanam theranam bhikkhunam pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkantanam mandalamale sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
sn41.1:1.3: “‘samyojanan’ti va, avuso, ‘samyojaniya dhamma’ti va ime dhamma nanattha nanabyanjana udahu ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti?
sn41.1:1.4: Tatrekaccehi therehi bhikkhuhi evam byakatam hoti:
sn41.1:1.5: “‘samyojanan’ti va, avuso, ‘samyojaniya dhamma’ti va ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca”ti.
sn41.1:1.6: Ekaccehi therehi bhikkhuhi evam byakatam hoti:
sn41.1:1.7: “‘samyojanan’ti va, avuso, ‘samyojaniya dhamma’ti va ime dhamma ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti.
sn41.1:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena citto gahapati migapathakam anuppatto hoti kenacideva karaniyena.
sn41.1:2.2: Assosi kho citto gahapati sambahulanam kira theranam bhikkhunam pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkantanam mandalamale sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
sn41.1:2.3: “‘samyojanan’ti va, avuso, ‘samyojaniya dhamma’ti va ime dhamma nanattha nanabyanjana udahu ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti?
sn41.1:2.5: “‘samyojanan’ti va, avuso, ‘samyojaniya dhamma’ti va ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca”ti.
sn41.1:2.7: “‘samyojanan’ti va, avuso, ‘samyojaniya dhamma’ti va ime dhamma ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti.
sn41.1:3.1: Atha kho citto gahapati yena thera bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva there bhikkhu abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhu etadavoca:
sn41.1:3.2: “sutam metam, bhante, sambahulanam kira theranam bhikkhunam pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkantanam mandalamale sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
sn41.1:3.3: ‘samyojanan’ti va, avuso, ‘samyojaniya dhamma’ti va ime dhamma nanattha nanabyanjana udahu ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti?
sn41.1:3.5: “‘samyojanan’ti va, avuso, ‘samyojaniya dhamma’ti va ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca”ti.
sn41.1:3.6: Ekaccehi therehi bhikkhuhi evam byakatam “‘samyojanan’ti va, avuso, ‘samyojaniya dhamma’ti va ime dhamma ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti.
sn41.1:4.1: “‘Samyojanan’ti va, bhante, ‘samyojaniya dhamma’ti va ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca.
sn41.1:4.2: Tena hi, bhante, upamam vo karissami.
sn41.1:4.3: Upamayapidhekacce vinnu purisa bhasitassa attham ajananti.
sn41.1:4.4: Seyyathapi, bhante, kalo ca balibaddo odato ca balibaddo ekena damena va yottena va samyutta assu.
sn41.1:4.6: ‘kalo balibaddo odatassa balibaddassa samyojanam, odato balibaddo kalassa balibaddassa samyojanan’ti, samma nu kho so vadamano vadeyya”ti?
sn41.1:4.8: Na kho, gahapati, kalo balibaddo odatassa balibaddassa samyojanam, napi odato balibaddo kalassa balibaddassa samyojanam;
sn41.1:4.9: yena kho te ekena damena va yottena va samyutta tam tattha samyojanan”ti.
sn41.1:4.10: “Evameva kho, bhante, na cakkhu rupanam samyojanam, na rupa cakkhussa samyojanam;
sn41.1:4.11: yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago tam tattha samyojanam.
sn41.1:4.15: na kayo photthabbanam samyojanam, na photthabba kayassa samyojanam;
sn41.1:4.16: yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago tam tattha samyojanam.
sn41.1:4.17: Na mano dhammanam samyojanam, na dhamma manassa samyojanam;
sn41.1:4.18: yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago tam tattha samyojanan”ti.
sn41.1:4.20: yassa te gambhire buddhavacane pannacakkhu kamati”ti.
